Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 52nd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1989...
Injured on 6/10/1991 with a Torn Rib Cage Muscle, out for 8-9 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1994, off Paul Quantrill (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/1994, off Mike Trombley (STL)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Los Angeles on 5/5/1995...
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 1996...
